General.Name: Eshallgo Inc. Class A Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Eshallgo Inc. engages in the sale and leasing of office equipment, mainly printers and copiers and after-sale maintenance and repair services in the People's Republic of China. The company sells office furniture, IT products, water dispensers, printing papers, and other products, as well as provides maintenance services with enterprise resource planning systems. It serves private and public sector businesses, as well as large enterprises and institutions. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Shanghai, China.
